website_summaries.verdict: If your favorite part of an Oreo is the filling and you can't get enough of the beloved flavor, chances are Double Stuf Oreos will become your favorite treat.
pros: As the name implies, these Oreos have double the creme filling of the classic variety
Stuffing is between two classic chocolate cookies
For many Oreo fans, these provide more of the best part of the popular cookie
cons: Some Oreo lovers find the extra stuffing too much and a bit too sweet
Rare reports of packages with missing cookies upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Box of Family size chocolate double stuff Oreos not full
customer_reviews.text: None of these have been eaten - my son opened it to take the picture showing cookies missing. In first picture he is showing how much is empty it is before opening. What to do? Can only report and hope this does not happen again and wonder whether or not to purchase this again. Shame on you, Oreo makers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packages did not come completely full.
customer_reviews.text: They are fresh and the basic quality you'd get from a store, but the packages I received were not completely filled and were missing about nine cookies worth per package. This is my first time ordering from here so I do not know if that is the reason, but I find it somewhat misleading as if this was purposeful then they add extra space to make it look bigger to market as "family size" but in reality, it is just empty space.
customer_reviews.author: Sabato

customer_reviews.title: Munchies Cure
customer_reviews.text: Good af soaked in milk. One serving of fruit and vegetables in every nine cookies!! Get home late from work? Too exhausted to cook for the fam? No problem! Oreos are the perfect substitute for breakfast, lunch, and/or dinner! Kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: yo!

customer_reviews.title: Which way does the cookie go? In my mouth.
customer_reviews.text: It's oreo double stuf, what's more to say? It's the dankest of dankest of cookies.
customer_reviews.author: CheenaIsNumbah1

customer_reviews.title: The package was fine, it wasn't full of busted up cookies or ...
customer_reviews.text: The package was fine, it wasn't full of busted up cookies or anything which may be a concern for some, but something odd. The package was literally missing 3 or 4 cookies. I was separating them into individual servings and observed this. Not sure this has happened to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Simpson

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Dessert or Snack
customer_reviews.text: Oreo Cookies have been around since 1912 and the combination of chocolate wafers with sweet crème filling makes for a nice dessert or snack. They don’t just have to be enjoyed as a cookie, though, since you can dunk them, pull them apart, or even blend them up as a dessert topping. These “double stuf” cookies have extra crème filling.
customer_reviews.author: RDDTop Contributor: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good
customer_reviews.text: Daughter ate all the fillings and left the cookies lol, the ones I did have tasted good, but honestly probably just get the regular ones, the filling is too much for me (not for my daughter who enjoyed all of it)
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa S.

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have ordered using Prime Pantry. I really wanted to see how well fragile items would make it to my home. I have to say I am very much impressed by how great the items ordered were packed. I ordered chips and cookies and a couple of packages of nuts. What gave me a great laugh was see that my order had been marked as left in my mailbox! I received it in a large box on my front porch! It's the little things that make me smile..... Cookies were good and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Of course they are Good
customer_reviews.text: i am a 60s kid. We know what the original Oreo looked like. Then they came out with the "double stuff" we were in heaven. Now the "double stuff" is the same amount as the original...Not double stuff. Just raise the price and give us the amount we are use to.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer brown

customer_reviews.title: Recipe Change vs. Years Past
customer_reviews.text: The "everything must be a health food" mob has destroyed another classic treat. These taste less flavorful and less sweet than years past. It's definitely different, more bland. I mourn the loss of the classic Oreo, not to mention the liberty to choose for myself to have one.
customer_reviews.author: WM

customer_reviews.title: Packed with heavy items... a mess!
customer_reviews.text: All 3 packages (family size) were broken. Every cookie that I picked up fell apart. They were packed with heavy items. I could not serve them! Each cookie crumbled into 5-6 pieces. A waste of my money. I would like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: GINI KANE

customer_reviews.title: I love Oreos. Oreos are the best cookies ever
customer_reviews.text: Like always I give my review with the good and the no so good The good -I love Oreos -great presentation packages for double stuff -great value for money The not so good -nothing
customer_reviews.author: Victor B.

customer_reviews.title: Freaking awesome
customer_reviews.text: We all know these are bomb. Ours arrived on time and fresh. Normally don’t buy these online but put together a pantry order during the COVID-19 mess and these were a nice find.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Made the perfect Minnie Mouse cupcakes!
customer_reviews.text: I used these to make my nieces Minnie Mouse cupcakes. They arrived fast, fresh and completely intact. The kids loved them!
customer_reviews.author: ChrissyHoff

customer_reviews.title: It says double stuf on the package but definitely not double stuf!
customer_reviews.text: Not double stuff and not full, but package was sealed!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Oooooih oreos...
customer_reviews.text: I had a large order from the Pantry and most everything was great...the Oreos were melted, broken and stale...both packages were...I ended up throwing them away and having to go to the store and buy more...they were for a cake I was making...
customer_reviews.author: Stefani Bender

customer_reviews.title: Fragile,  but yum.
customer_reviews.text: Love OREO'S. I think since pandemic the cookie is more fragile. They break easily. I'm a dunker. Cant do that if they fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: JOJO

customer_reviews.title: Oreos. Fresh. Some broken in shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I love Oreos and I love being able to get them to delivered. However, expect some broken cookies when you order them from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jillcat

customer_reviews.title: Single stuff/ Not double stuff
customer_reviews.text: We thought we were getting "double stuff" . The package says double stuff, we paid for double stuff and received single stuff. Just odd.
customer_reviews.author: BBTideLife17

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Tried to order the mega stuffed oreos at the time, but it was out of stock. Ordered the double stuffed instead. Still yummy! Kids ate the inside and mommy enjoyed the cookies in milk! lol
customer_reviews.author: D1021

customer_reviews.title: You will love.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these a few times they are very good and they arrived very fresh and good. Big plus because they are my favorite cookies..
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: All packs were legit double stuffed Oreos
customer_reviews.text: Packages arrived in tact, cookies inside are in good condition. Now I must implement rationing of these glorious treats!
customer_reviews.author: K. Conidi

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: When I got them they were all broken in pieces. But my husband said he will use them for ice cream lol
customer_reviews.author: melissa lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Good any time snack
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the old ones used to be, but they're still yummy. Great with very cold milk or vanilla ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: RK reader

customer_reviews.title: Maybe your package will be fresh. I ordered several packages and none of them taste fresh.
customer_reviews.text: The cookies didn't taste fresh. I'll maybe try again because the price was reasonable in hopes that my specific order of cookies was just expired.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Double stuf?
customer_reviews.text: I found it difficult to see the difference between these and the regular thickness Oreo cookies. Double stuf?
customer_reviews.author: Teeekay

customer_reviews.title: oreo treats
customer_reviews.text: i pass a few of them out here in Kyrgzystan to children living in our area as a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Don Scott

customer_reviews.title: Arrived packaged well, son loves them
customer_reviews.text: Cookies arrived perfectly. The box and cookies were not smashed or broken. All were 100% intact.
customer_reviews.author: Mishal Bajwa

customer_reviews.title: It's Oreos, need I say more?
customer_reviews.text: These were delivered fast and fresh and needless to say did not last long. Yummy!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: The double stuffing is overkill.
customer_reviews.text: Oreos are the iconic cookie of America. I would prefer that the Amazon Prime Pantry service also stocked the original Oreo cookie. This double stuffing makes them too sweet. The double stuffing overpowers the chocolate taste of the cake part of the cookie.
customer_reviews.author: Terry A. Berglund

customer_reviews.title: Oreo
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know about you but I gotta have some milk to dip these in. Plus, if you’re not careful you might eat almost all.
customer_reviews.author: T.A.

customer_reviews.title: Still great!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, I have loved since I was a kid and used to dip in milk. Still great!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hickey

customer_reviews.title: the extra filling is too much
customer_reviews.text: I love oreos as a treat once in a while. I had a few of these and the amount of sugar in them made me nauseous. I will not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: enchanting

customer_reviews.title: The product arrived promptly, but the packing was deficient. A number of the cookies were damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The product represented its usual outstanding quality, but unfortunately quite a few of the individual items were damaged in shipping and fell apart when picked up.
customer_reviews.author: William T. Warren, III

customer_reviews.title: Delicious.
customer_reviews.text: No Packs Were Really Banged up, Sell by Date's Are All Good, Oreos are Delicious.... I'm Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Like the quality Oreos
customer_reviews.text: I like these oreo cookies. Wish there were banana tasting ones.
customer_reviews.author: pdogg

customer_reviews.title: The best!!
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing like a real Oreo dipped in milk!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: 3rd box I've ordered
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd box I've ordered and is always so fresh and tastes so yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Sandlot

customer_reviews.title: Only Half Full
customer_reviews.text: I received this "family size" package of Oreos thinking it would be full, like the smaller packages are. Unfortunately when I opened it, it looked like someone had eaten half the cookies! There were empty spaces in the tray, which left the cookies broken and left me very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki McKernan

customer_reviews.title: Best store bought cookie every
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with an Oreo, whether for pie crust, rolled in, or just as a cookie yummy
customer_reviews.author: Mrs H

customer_reviews.title: Not fresh
customer_reviews.text: Of course oreo has changed however the taste was not like it use to be, Kinda stale tasting to wife and I.
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: minor complaints
customer_reviews.text: I love double stuffed Oreos. Some of them were broken and the pack did not seem completely full but they were still delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny DiMattei

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: They’re Oreos. I can’t immagine anything less than five stars.
customer_reviews.author: billy gardner

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Opened the cookies up to see this .. the entire center row is damaged and either crushed or broken
customer_reviews.author: Fred Sponheimer

customer_reviews.title: Under-filled package
customer_reviews.text: Package was definitely missing Oreos. Although the seal was still intact on the package I don’t know that I would order through here again. Seems a little like Nabisco send there “defective” products to Amazon because people wouldn’t actually buy them at the grocery store....
customer_reviews.author: John Murray

customer_reviews.title: Product was not complete when opened
customer_reviews.text: These tasted as they should except there was 6-10 cookies missing when we opened them. Seems like a fluke maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and yummy
customer_reviews.text: Daughter just loves oreos. Have had these for about a week now. And havent had any complaints of being stale or anything.
customer_reviews.author: missmomof1

customer_reviews.title: Taste great andfilling...
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty, I Love Oreo's and these have been fresh and tasty just th way I like em 😋 "Mmmm..." Keep em coming...
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Usually they deliver it fine but the Oreos were not double stuf this time
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: The Oreo cookies came on time and they were delicious
customer_reviews.author: Mary Adornetto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: How can Oreos not be great! Always a good cookie choice. These were very good.
customer_reviews.author: CammyV

customer_reviews.title: Just Love Oreo
customer_reviews.text: I am a Oreo. My opinion doesn't matter here ^-^
customer_reviews.author: Theo K

customer_reviews.title: If you don't like Oreos, You need help
customer_reviews.text: What more can you say about Oreos? Haven't changed since I was a kid and hope they never do.
customer_reviews.author: cleosmom

customer_reviews.title: Not Double Stuffed
customer_reviews.text: I've eaten these for years and the cream filling was like regular oreos. I don't know if I got a bad batch or if Nabisco is getting cheap on filling these oreos as they should be...double stuffed.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Reckard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too addictive, got to avoid buying these because they end up gone by the next day.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Arrived perfect
customer_reviews.text: The whole box of pantry items arrived perfect thank you amazon
customer_reviews.author: r k archambeault

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great! Product arrived as advertised, perfectly wrapped and on time.
customer_reviews.author: BFitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Got to have my oreo' there is no substitute for the best taste fresh and so good
customer_reviews.author: cheeky

customer_reviews.title: Only way to eat
customer_reviews.text: Double stuff oreos are the only way to go. Now a days they put so little filling in the original that the 'double stuff' is just what used to be a normal oreo back in the 80's
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing cookies
customer_reviews.text: These weren't double stuffed at all, plus like the other reviews were actually missing about 9 cookies. Still, tastes like an oreo so theres that at least.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Michaelis

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous to have in the house
customer_reviews.text: Good enough and the same quality as you'd find in a grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Tyr Na Nog

customer_reviews.title: Missing Oreos!
customer_reviews.text: This is what they looked like when I opened the package. VERY disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Felecia D. Wofford

customer_reviews.title: Oreo ice cream
customer_reviews.text: My cookies were crushed a little but that was good I made Oreo ice cream with them
customer_reviews.author: buddybear

customer_reviews.title: Just like from the store. Tasty oreos.
customer_reviews.text: Just like you'd buy in the store. Get your double-stuf munch on!
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: Dry
customer_reviews.text: There was a hole in the bag and cookies were very dry and brittle.
customer_reviews.author: Reverend Skull

customer_reviews.title: The same as all other #1 reviews
customer_reviews.text: Not like the oreo cookie made with pride,more like a pet treat,broken,tray slots 2/3 filled,not at all as shown or listed. Will pass on these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Marchant

customer_reviews.title: Skimpy Oreos
customer_reviews.text: So Very small!! Sad at what double stuff has become. They r like the originals used to be. 😞😞😞😞😞😞
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Broken cookies
customer_reviews.text: .y cookies were broken, every cookie in the package was broken. They were also Not double stuffed.
customer_reviews.author: Granny61

customer_reviews.title: Oreos. Good.
customer_reviews.text: Write a review for purchased Oreos? Why yes. They are delicious. Will 100% purchase again. And again.
customer_reviews.author: Mak

customer_reviews.title: Oreos from Amazon are terrible.
customer_reviews.text: The cream flavor is awful. Best to by from local market
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Double stuf Oreos's - that says it all
customer_reviews.text: who could give Oreo's less than a five star rating! A nutritionist maybe..
customer_reviews.author: Mike McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Cheated!
customer_reviews.text: Cheated out of my money again! I could have just bought the regular pack. This is the second time the rows are short cookies. Do yourself a favor and save your money! Order the regular size!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Perfection. Everything was perfectly fine. I bought 2 packs, everything was there and tasted great.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Stale!!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quick!. BUT Oreos were all stale!!. Be warned!
customer_reviews.author: Nate Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Sandwich Cookie Nirvana
customer_reviews.text: They’re no Hydrox but with some 2% milk- quite an afternoon in sweatpants!
customer_reviews.author: Carmel Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with not one broken! I'll order cookies and potato chips from Amazon again. 👍
customer_reviews.author: JYV

customer_reviews.title: I THINK THEY SHOULD SUPER SIZE THEM
customer_reviews.text: I THINK THEY SHOULD SUPER SIZE THEM!! HOW ABOUT THE COOKIES AND MAKE THE PACKAGE BIGGER!! THE WORLD WOULD BE A BETTER PLACE!! YES!!! I SAID IT!!! LOL!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Saunderson

customer_reviews.title: A Classic
customer_reviews.text: Oreos are the Kings of Cookies. I prefer regular Oreos to the Double Stuff because I'm picky about my cookie-to-cream ratio, these are still delicious and the price was right on Prime Pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and Intact.
customer_reviews.text: Needed these for a birthday party, loved that the family size was significantly cheaper than at other grocery stores. Came in fresh and intact.
customer_reviews.author: Jared H.

customer_reviews.title: Yumm yumm yumm
customer_reviews.text: Yummmm yummmm yummmm i love these cookies. Double stuffed oeros. Yummm yummm yummm. You can't tell we love them. LoL
customer_reviews.author: Kara will

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: I have order four or five time and have been pleasantly surprised at how few break.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmother of 5

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: A few were missing but that happens in stores to so I’m not worried about it overall they are very delicious
customer_reviews.author: Evalynn

product_meta.title: OREO Double Stuf Chocolate Sandwich Cookies, Family Size, 20 oz
product_meta.description:
OREO Double Stuf Chocolate Sandwich Cookies have been America's favorite cookie for over 100 years. Stuffed with twice as much delicious OREO creme, these chocolate sandwich cookies are supremely dunkable. Double Stuf OREO cookies are great for sharing with friends, serving at parties, or enjoying with cold milk. They also make delicious sweet snacks for school lunch, work or home. The resealable package with easy-pull tab keeps chocolate cookies fresh and is perfect for snacking, sharing, or traveling.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Product Dimensions :1.38 x 9 x 6.23 inches; 1.45 Pounds
 * Item model number :PDK_00000068398
 * Date First Available :September 2, 2016
 * Manufacturer :MOQ4F
 * ASIN :B01LF71T88

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.8 out of 5 stars2,082 ratings OREO Double Stuf Chocolate Sandwich Cookies have been America's favorite cookie for over 100 years. Stuffed with twice as much delicious OREO creme, these chocolate sandwich cookies are supremely dunkable. Double Stuf OREO cookies are great for sharing with friends, serving at parties, or enjoying with cold milk. They also make delicious sweet snacks for school lunch, work or home. The resealable package with easy-pull tab keeps chocolate cookies fresh and is perfect for snacking, sharing, or traveling.
feature_bullets: One 20 oz family size package of OREO Double Stuf Chocolate Sandwich Cookies
Chocolate wafers stuffed with twice the OREO creme
Enjoy as birthday treats or a sweet snack any day of the week
Family size cookies are great for sharing with friends and family
